mapper.select: SELECT a.menu_name menuBoxName FROM sys_eve_menu a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_user c, sys_eve_role d WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', c.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', d.id, ',')) AND d.id = b.role_id AND a.id = b.menu_id AND c.id = #{userId} AND a.menu_url = '--' AND a.menu_level = '0' AND a.id NOT IN (SELECT e.menu_id AS id FROM sys_eve_user_custom_menu_del e WHERE e.create_id = #{userId}) AND a.menu_name = #{menuBoxName} GROUP BY a.id UNION SELECT a.menu_box_name menuBoxName FROM sys_eve_user_custom_menubox a WHERE a.create_id = #{userId} AND a.menu_box_name = #{menuBoxName}
SELECT a.order_num orderNum FROM sys_eve_user_custom_menubox a WHERE a.create_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.order_num DESC LIMIT 1
